Title: Provides for increasing the applicability of brand name and generic prescription drug and other medical services co-payments for medicaid recipients
Summary: Provides for increasing the applicability of brand name and generic prescription drugs and other medical services, except diagnostic services, co-payments for medicaid recipients.
LawCode: Amd ยง367-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to medicaid co-payments for prescription drugs and other services
